name: Zwemper
description:
This is one of the most entertaining 2018 games.
Jump higher and higher with the ball and collect the items to unlock new characters. Stay calm so as not to crash.

Just tap the screen at the right moment with your finger to jump. Land on the next platform to stay alive. This game is very easy to play, but hard to master! Are you one of the best?

In this game the Play Services are integrated. Submit your highscore directly to the global highscore list. The glory is yours if you make it to the top!
